```{r PAS_design}

#this function created  an dds object 
PAS_design<-function(x, PAS, anno){
  dds<-DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = PAS, 
                              colData = anno, 
                              design = x)
  keep<-rowSums(counts(dds)) >=10
  dds<-dds[keep,]
}

x <- ~ Grav + Para + sectio + Csec + place

PAS_design( x, PAS, anno )
```
